name: It is your Destiny
description:
"It is your Destiny" is an extreme horror game made by me "I'm Vegan". I got to know about Unreal Engine 5 two weeks ago and made a part of my story into this small game :D Rate the game from 0 to 10 and buy me a thank coffee by donating it'd melt my heart into joy :D

Other small parts of the game are in development, after making all the parts, the main game will be released, considering all bugs and issues solved.
